title: Autonomous 80+ Contact POC Execution
description: Run autonomous batch contact discovery on 84 high-value targets using weighted coordination with IF Guardians oversight. This is the dogfooding moment - using InfraFabric to validate InfraFabric.

approach.oversight: IF Guardians debate runs in parallel
approach.safeguards: Human review checkpoint before any outreach

risks: False positives (heuristic contact discovery may guess wrong emails)
Privacy at scale (processing 84 public figures' data)
Bias in heuristics (patterns may favor certain contact types)
Time investment (3+ hours for full 84 contacts)
No validation loop (can't verify emails without sending)
safeguards: Free agents only (no API costs, no rate limits)

success_criteria.technical: All 84 contacts processed with confidence scores
success_criteria.ethical: IF Guardians approve approach and safeguards
success_criteria.late_bloomers: At least 1 late bloomer pattern identified

philosophy: This IS InfraFabric dogfooding itself. The system that documents itself will improve itself through this POC. The system that improves itself will discover late bloomers. The late bloomers will validate the patience principle.
meta_recognition: Running this autonomously with Guardian oversight demonstrates the recursive nature of IF: the governance mechanism governs the validation mechanism that validates the governance mechanism.
